content.text: Candice Swanepoel was born and raised in Mooi River, South Africa.

Considering that the vast majority of South Africans are Christian,

content.text: As often happens to models, she's been criticized for being too thin,
which can have implications for the politics of body image and how women are represented in the media. Her response was to say:

content.text: I am healthy and happy. I'm heartened to know how much everyone cares about me, but in this case, everything is normal and good.
